title: Meditation: Open-Hearted Presence (2020-02-12)
itunes:title: Meditation: Open-Hearted Presence
description: Meditation: Open-Hearted Presence (2020-02-12) - This meditation establishes a kind attention by bringing the imagery and felt sense of a smile into the body scan, and then with the breath as a home base, opens the attention to changing experience. We end with a brief loving kindness reflection.
